=================================
DRIVE Database Interface for Bob
=================================
This package is part of the signal-processing and machine learning toolbox
Bob_. It provides an interface for the `DRIVE Dataset`_. This package does
not contain the original data files, which need to be obtained through the link
above.

Installation
------------

Complete bob's `installation`_ instructions. Then, to install this
package, run::

  $ conda install bob.db.drive


Contact
-------

For questions or reporting issues to this software package, contact our
development `mailing list`_.
